title: TOKIMEKI Runners

description: TOKIMEKI Runners (lit. EXCITED Runners) is the title track and first song on Nijigasaki High School Idol Club's debut album of the same name, and the eleventh track on their third album, Just Believe!!!. It is also their first group song. It was released on November 21, 2018 with a PV, the opening movie to Love Live! School Idol Festival ALL STARS, and a solo song from each member.
